TestCase.Title: Test case EID_CLIENT_D_20
TestCase.Purpose: This test unit evaluates the eID-Client disallowing the selection of access rights which are not granted in the CHAT of the eService certificate.

Command.Text: Follow the Online-Authentication as described in until the access rights are displayed. Use the eService certificate [CERT_CV_TERM_1_C] instead of [CERT_CV_TERM_1_A].

TestStep.Description: The eService certificate [CERT_CV_TERM_1_C] only allows access to a particular data group.

ExpectedResult.Text: The access rights of the eService are displayed.
The eID-Client does not allow the selection of rights which are not granted in the CHAT of the eService certificate.
